name: Total Singu
description: Total Singu is a top down shooter. Follow the main character Singu, through this short but epic narrative. Discover and uncover the journey though 15 levels of exploration and find out what it means to be Total Singu.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 50 MB available space
